SELECT ad.subject, ad.state AS doc_state, al.state AS detail_state, al.app_date, al.order, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS no FROM appr_doc ad, appr_line al WHERE ad.mem_id=#{loginId} AND ad.doc_idx=al.doc_idx AND (@ROWNUM:=0)=0 AND al.app_date IS NULL GROUP BY subject

SELECT p.prj_subject, pp.subject, pt.state, pt.plan_start, pt.plan_end FROM prj_post pp, project p, prj_task pt WHERE pp.prj_cat_idx='2' AND pp.prj_idx=#{prj_idx} AND pp.prj_post_idx=pt.prj_post_idx AND pt.mem_id=#{loginId} AND p.prj_idx=pp.prj_idx ORDER BY plan_end DESC
